page.title: 06THE TEAM VALLEY TRADING EST
page.content: In 1936 work started on an estate of ready built factories to make work for the unemployed.By 1939 4000 people worked there.Today the Team Valley has the headquarters for all English Industrial Estates at St.George's House,Methven House is the regional headquarters.Increased car parks and the Western Bypass have been built. New factories can be rented or bought.Those in the Enterprise Zone receive financial help for 10 years. Enterprise house,a new block of 28 offices, is so successful that another is planned.Today 14000 people are employed in 94 factories. Out of the 740 pupils at Breckenbeds School 165 parents work in the "Valley", sadly there is still much unemployment.
